user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: Code and documentation on configuring Azure Active Directory to automatically create teams as part of the just-in-time provisioning workflow via SAML.

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: A simple example to get the exiration dates of api credentials for your users.

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: Get a list of users with their attributes.

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: Deactivates a provided list of users on the Veracode Platform.

user-provisioning-management-and-deprovi.description: Uses the Veracode Identity API to add roles (Security Labs User, Greenlight IDE User, or eLearning) to existing users.
